name: SEER Mets
title: SEER Mets
notes:
**Note 1:**  Metastasis to adnexa, parametria, pelvic serosa, or vagina is coded in SEER Primary Tumor.

**Note 2:**  When both Federation Internationale de Gynecologie et d'Obstetrique (FIGO) stage and metastatic detail are available, record the code with metastatic detail in preference to a statement of FIGO stage.

**Note 3:**  FIGO Stage IV, NOS is assigned based on tumor extension and/or metastasis.  Code SEER Mets based on a physician's statement of FIGO Stage IV, NOS only if it is known that the stage value is assigned because of metastasis.
footnotes:
\## Considered regional in Historic Stage
\*** Considered regional in 1977 Summary Staging Guide
